product_name: Patagonia Fogbank Trench Rain Coat - Men's
long_description: The Fogbank Trench Rain Coat from Patagonia is made of a durable H2No(R) Performance Standard 2.5-layer nylon fabric with a waterproof breathable barrier. Polyester plain weave lining with a waterproof breathable barrier and a Durable Water Repellent finish; lining is fully seam-sealed. Removable hood with extended brim and adjustable drawcords lets you add more protection when the rain kicks up. Zip front with stormflap. Handwarmer pockets; internal left-chest zip pocket. Cuff tabs with 2-position snaps. Pleat at back hem; mid-thigh length.
short_description: The Fogbank Trench Rain Coat from Patagonia is made of a durable H2No(R) Performance Standard 2.5-layer nylon fabric with a waterproof breathable barrier.
